article.title: FoodSafety.gov
article.description:
FoodSafety.gov
[Skip to main content](#main-content)
![U.S. flag](http://foodsafety.gov/themes/custom/foodsafety/assets/img/us_flag_small.png)
An official website of the United States government
Here’s how you know
Here’s how you know
![Dot gov](http://foodsafety.gov/themes/custom/foodsafety/assets/img/icon-dot-gov.svg)
**Official websites use .gov**
A**.gov**website belongs to an official government organization in the United States.
![Https](http://foodsafety.gov/themes/custom/foodsafety/assets/img/icon-https.svg)
**Secure .gov websites use HTTPS**
A**lock**() or**https://**means you’ve safely connected to the .gov website. Share sensitive information only on official, secure websites.
[![Home](http://foodsafety.gov/themes/custom/foodsafety/assets/img/fs-logo.png)](http://foodsafety.gov/)*[FoodSafety.gov](http://foodsafety.gov/)*

![close](http://foodsafety.gov/themes/custom/foodsafety/assets/img/close.svg)
